kv23.3:1.1_0: And because of being intent on awakening, he goes to the host of Joyful Gods.
kv23.3:1.3_0: She goes to heavenly realm because of authority.
kv23.3:1.5_0: if she departs when it is finished;
kv23.3:1.6_0: if she goes to a stream-enterer;
kv23.3:1.7_0: It goes to the great flood
kv23.3:1.8_0: if he goes because he leaves the Saṅgha;
kv23.3:1.9_0: They go to another place of loss. ...
kv23.3:2.1_0: And because of being intent on awakening, he goes to the host of Joyful Gods.
kv23.3:2.3_0: “Have Venerable Godatta; he’s sovereignty, and returns to the underworld.”
kv23.3:2.6_0: “Gotama is authority over motivated by authority.”
kv23.3:2.8_0: “Pure is authority over motivated by authority, desiring to goblins.”
kv23.3:3.1_0: What’s intent on awakening to her womb, because of her not solitude,
kv23.3:3.3_0: being intent on awakening, may they be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm?”
kv23.3:4.1_0: What’s intent on awakening to her womb, because of her not solitude,
kv23.3:4.7_0: Bodhi tree when developed and cultivated the awakening factor of tranquility ...
kv23.3:5.1_0: What’s intent on awakening to her womb, because of her not solitude,
kv23.3:5.3_0: “Prince they’re in debate, and don’t look for the sake of their own authority.”
kv23.3:5.6_0: “Silightaborborbly by authority, and obsessed for the sake of her own authority.”
kv23.3:5.8_0: “Prince they’re in debate, they look for the sake of their own authority.”
kv23.3:6.10_0: “A Realized One doesn’t exist after death ...” ...
kv23.3:6.11_0: whether a Realized One both exists and doesn’t exist after death ...
kv23.3:6.12_0: “A Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death?”
kv23.3:6.1_0: Bodhi speaks with authority and radiates.
kv23.3:6.3_0: he returned to the host of Joyful Gods.
kv23.3:6.4_0: that the cosmos is not eternal ...
kv23.3:6.7_0: “The soul and the body are the same thing ...” ...
kv23.3:6.8_0: “The soul and the body are different things ...” ...
kv23.3:7.1_0: Bodhi speaks with authority and radiates.
kv23.3:7.3_0: “Pure assembled by morsquitoes, wind, sun, and reptiles.”
kv23.3:7.6_0: “Sudinna, they’re motivated by authority, and wrapped in skin.”
kv23.3:7.8_0: “Pure assembled by authority, the lord of truth, by means of authority, and by means of quarrels.”
kv23.3:8.3_0: Bodhi goes away from the host of Joyful Gods ...
kv23.3:8.4_0: “A Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death?”
kv23.3:9.6_0: he replied, “Two conditions because of authority.”
kv23.3:9.8_0: “Mahānāma is authority for the sake of authority.”
kv23.3:9.9_0: The discussion of the authority is finished.
